testcase.classname: F01_Register | user should be register his data to the system

testcase.name: user could register with valid necessary and optional data
testcase.system-out: Given Go to Register Page...................................................passed When user select female gender..............................................passed And Enter valid "automation" "tester" "Tssst4@example.com" "P@ssw0rd" and "P@ssw0rd".passed And Enter birth of day......................................................passed And Enter birth of Month....................................................passed And Enter birth of year.....................................................passed And user press on register button...........................................passed Then System direct user to profile page.....................................passed

testcase.name: user make sure about the default currency

testcase.name: user could select any option from currency dropdown

testcase.classname: F04_Hovering | user could hover on any option and select different categories
testcase.name: logged user could hover on Apparel option and select clothes category
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" "tsst4@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed When user hover on Apparel option and select clothes category...............passed Then user move successfully to the clothes page.............................passed

testcase.classname: F10_CheckOut | logged user could finish his order
testcase.name: user could checkout his order when he fill all required data
testcase.system-out: Given Go to Register Page...................................................passed When Enter valid "automation" "tester" "test4@example.com" "P@ssw0rd" and "P@ssw0rd".passed And user press on register button...........................................passed Then System direct user to profile page.....................................passed Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" "test4@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed When logged user press on jewelry category..................................passed And press add to cart to flower bracelet....................................passed And Go to shopping cart page................................................passed And Press on services terms and checkout button.............................passed And user fill the data of billing address press on continue button..........passed And user select Ground of shipping method and press continue................passed And user select Check_money for payment method and press continue...........passed And user press continue for payment information.............................passed And user press confirm for confirm order....................................passed Then order has been successfully processed..................................passed
